comments.body: Heh. Did this raise a compiler error? I just want to make sure we didn't miss any other spots.
The PyArray_DATA raised an error after the change to returning `void*`, so I changed it to use `PyArray_BYTES`
Yes, void pointers can't be used in arithmetic. I just wanted to make sure we fixed all the spots where it could be an issue.

Do we put `\n` in long warnings? Actually a serious question, I never did, but maybe it reads easier for the user.

Other than discussing message wording, I think as you said in those other PRs, needs mention in the release notes.
